categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic organizations

nodes.text: Committee on Starfighter Acquisition and Maintenance

The Committee on Starfighter Acquisition and Maintenance was an Alliance to Restore the Republic organization that oversaw the Alliance's starfighter acquisition program. The organization was so important that it was headed by the Minister of War himself, and included the Minister of Supply, the Minister of Industry, the Minister of Finance, along with a number of ace pilots and Wing Commanders.
